title: SUPPORT WANTED for TSSi (the secret spoon institute)
body:
Our team is still in provisionals and we need a _good_ support.
Even if it's just for one game.
It would also be a bonus if you could do adc as well.

replies.body: I can support pretty well, I'm currently in B3, so obviously i'm not anything special but if I have a good ADC to stick with we usually dominate. I play Nautilus and Sona mostly, feel free to hit me up. :)

I'll support or ADC
Plat 2
Main supports are - Vlad, Garen, Teemo, GP, Blitz, Brand

are you serious?
Gp and Blitz are the only viable champs you mentioned
You found no support? what about James??

G1 Support main, VERY good as janna and decent as naut.
IGN: Kitty Katt
